test_data.py¶

This module contains the tests to the class DataStrutctureType in data.py module.

This test serves to ensure the viability of the methods of the class DataStructureType in data.py.

class test_data.TestDataStructureType[source]¶

This class contain the test methods to the class data.py.

Methods

test__append_list()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if the elements list is invalid.

Append element values and it’s ids to the data structure elements.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If the results there aren’t the expected.
